original_text: In the middle of the day, it becomes dark for those people. At midday, they see no better than blind people. In the middle of the day, it becomes dark for those people.
korean_text: 그들은 낮에도 어두움을 만나고 대낮에도 더듬기를 밤과 같이 하느니라

sentences.original_text: In the middle of the day
it becomes dark for those people
they see no better than blind people
In the middle of the day
it becomes dark for those people
